text:
*UPDATE: We have found someone to work with - Thank you! I am keeping everyone's info on file bc I am sure we will need additional help in the future.* 

Hi there,
I am looking for someone who has experience as a HubSpot websites dev for a client contract we are working on.

We have a 2 devs who have recently completed the HubSpot cert however we could use someone with more experience to help us out a couple hours a week to start. We will be moving into a new contract with the client in July and will have a full scope of work 2nd week of July where hours may be expanded.

<https://www.swarmnyc.com/|I am reaching out from>
Hey Megan, this definetly sounds like something we could help with. I'll send you a DM :wink:
Hi Megan, I can help you with this. Would you mind scheduling a call to discuss the project further? DMed you the meeting link.

purpose: Please be very careful when negotiating job/gig opportunities through Slack. Verify the validity of all parties involved before proceeding.
